SEARCH
Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model

Class Flight

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.Flight
public class Flight extends Object
Represents a flight in the booking system. Stores flight details, passenger list, capacity, and pricing information.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate)
    Creates a new Flight with basic details (capacity and price set to defaults).
    Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int capacity, double price)
    Creates a new Flight with full details including capacity and price.

  • Constructor Details

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate)
      Creates a new Flight with basic details (capacity and price set to defaults).
      Parameters:
      id - the unique flight identifier
      flightNumber - the flight number (e.g., "BA123")
      origin - the departure location
      destination - the arrival location
      departureDate - the date of departure

    • Flight

      public Flight(int id, String flightNumber, String origin, String destination, LocalDate departureDate, int capacity, double price)
      Creates a new Flight with full details including capacity and price.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique flight identifier
      flightNumber - the flight number (e.g., "BA123")
      origin - the departure location
      destination - the arrival location
      departureDate - the date of departure
      capacity - the maximum number of passengers
      price - the price per seat

    • addPassengerSafe

      public boolean addPassengerSafe(Customer passenger)
      Safely adds a passenger to the flight, checking capacity and deleted status.
      Parameters:
      passenger - the customer to add as a passenger
      Returns:
      true if the passenger was added, false if flight is full or deleted

    • addPassenger

      public void addPassenger(Customer passenger)
      Adds a passenger to the flight without capacity checking. Use this only when loading from storage.
      Parameters:
      passenger - the customer to add as a passenger

    • removePassenger

      public void removePassenger(Customer passenger)
      Removes a passenger from the flight.
      Parameters:
      passenger - the customer to remove

    • getAvailableSeats

      public int getAvailableSeats()
      Gets the number of available seats on this flight.
      Returns:
      the number of seats still available

    • getDetailsShort

      public String getDetailsShort()
      Gets a short description of the flight.
      Returns:

    • getDetailsLong

      public String getDetailsLong()
      Gets a detailed description of the flight.
      Returns:
      a formatted string with comprehensive flight information

    • getDetailsLongExtra

      public String getDetailsLongExtra()
      Gets extended details including deleted status.
      Returns:
      a formatted string with all flight information
